game_state.last_scenario_text:
You strain your eyes trying to decipher the ancient symbols and understand the spectral ritual unfolding before you, but the shifting blue flames create confusing shadows that obscure crucial details. Just as you're beginning to make sense of the scene, one of the spectral figures suddenly stops mid-chant and turns its hollow gaze directly toward your hiding spot - you've been spotted! The other two spirits pause their circling, and an unnatural chill fills the air as all three begin to drift menacingly in your direction.

**What do you do?**

1. **Stealth Check (DC 18)** - Quickly duck behind the nearest cover and attempt to break line of sight before the specters can pinpoint your exact location

2. **Persuasion Check (DC 16)** - Step out with hands raised and try to convince the spirits you mean no harm, hoping to avoid a confrontation

3. **Combat** - Stand your ground and prepare for battle as the three angry spirits approach (3 Specters)

4. **Athletics Check (DC 14)** - Make a hasty retreat, sprinting back toward the bridge before the specters can surround you
